Key Match Events: India defeated Afghanistan by six wickets in the first T20I
A run-chase that got underway with a horrible mix-up, resulting in Rohit Sharma's run out
Axar Patel and Mukesh Kumar bagged two wickets each for India
Mohammad Nabi hit a quickfire 42 for Afghanistan
Azmatullah Omarzai played a rapid cameo of 29
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Mohali
